# Best Shipping Dashboard
**Version:** 1.0.0
**Server:** .246 (Demos) | **Ports:** Backend :8001, Frontend :3001
**Domain:** bestshipping.rize.bm
**Status:** Demo Ready

## Overview

Customer-facing dashboard for Best Shipping (Bermuda-based freight/logistics company). Provides clients with real-time visibility into shipment status, financial obligations, and account history.

## Quick Start

```bash
cd ~/best-shipping-dashboard

# Backend (FastAPI)
cd backend
source venv/bin/activate
uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8001

# Frontend (React/Vite)
cd ../frontend
npm run dev -- --port 3001
```

## Architecture

| Component | Technology | Port |
|-----------|------------|------|
| Backend | Python FastAPI | 8001 |
| Frontend | React + Vite + Tailwind | 3001 |
| Database | PostgreSQL | 5432 |

## Demo Credentials

| Email | Password | Role |
|-------|----------|------|
| cornell@bestshipping.bm | demo2026 | Customer |
| admin@bestshipping.bm | admin2026 | Admin |

## API Endpoints

| Method | Endpoint | Description |
|--------|----------|-------------|
| POST | /api/auth/login | Authentication |
| GET | /api/health | Health check |
| GET | /api/dashboard | Dashboard summary |
| GET | /api/shipments | List shipments |
| GET | /api/shipments/{id} | Shipment detail |
| GET | /api/financials | Financial overview |
| GET | /api/documents | Document library |

## Pages

| Page | Description |
|------|-------------|
| Dashboard | Active shipments, upcoming arrivals, outstanding balance |
| Shipments | Filterable list with status badges |
| Shipment Detail | Full lifecycle timeline, documents, costs |
| Financials | Invoice list, payment history, aging |
| Documents | Searchable document library |
| Account | Profile and preferences |

## Features

- [x] User authentication (JWT)
- [x] Shipment tracking with visual pipeline
- [x] Financial dashboard with aging
- [x] Document management
- [x] Best Shipping branding (navy/white/accent blue)
- [x] Mobile responsive

## Integration Status

| System | Status | Notes |
|--------|--------|-------|
| CargoWise | Mock | Awaiting API credentials |
| QuickBooks | Mock | Awaiting OAuth setup |
| Email Parser | Mock | Awaiting IMAP access |

## Deployment

Running via PM2 or systemd. Accessible via Cloudflare tunnel at bestshipping.rize.bm.

## Contact

- Project Owner: Artie (artiedarrell@gmail.com)
- Client Stakeholder: Cornell (Best Shipping)

AI-powered case management and reporting system for Bermuda Police Services. Features multi-model AI report generation, internal affairs monitoring, and integrated legal/news research capabilities.

## Core Features

### 1. Case Management
- **3 Case Types:** Domestic Abuse, Gang/Drug, Traffic
- Pre-filled forms with dropdowns
- Voice dictation support
- Extensible template architecture

### 2. Multi-AI Report Generation
| Model | Provider | Type |
|-------|----------|------|
| Claude | Anthropic | Cloud |
| GPT-4 | OpenAI | Cloud |
| Gemini | Google | Cloud |
| Llama 3 8B | Ollama | Local |
| Mistral 7B | Ollama | Local |

### 3. Internal Affairs Module
- Separate authentication & database
- Officer activity monitoring
- Full investigation workflow
- Audit logging
- Purple/dark theme for visual distinction

### 4. Legal & News Research (RAG)
- **Bermuda Laws Database** - 98 scraped laws (62 police-priority)
- **News Archive** - 10 years from Royal Gazette & Bernews
- Vector search for AI-enhanced research
- AI Law Assistant for statute explanations

### 5. Analytics Dashboard
- Case statistics & trends
- AI usage metrics
- Officer activity reports

| Auth | NextAuth.js |
| AI Cloud | Claude, OpenAI, Gemini APIs |
| AI Local | Ollama (Llama 3, Mistral) |

| Scraping | Puppeteer, Cheerio |
| Hosting | Hyper-V VM, Cloudflare Tunnel |

---

# Premier Health EMR

> Modern AI-powered Electronic Medical Records system built for Premier Health, Bermuda

## Status: ✅ Phase 1 Complete - MVP Deployed

**Version:** v0.4.0
**Server:** 192.168.65.246 (demos)
**Production URL:** https://emr.rize.bm
**Homebase:** http://192.168.65.245:8000/projects

---

## Overview

Premier Health EMR is a next-generation electronic medical records system designed specifically for the Bermuda healthcare market. Built with AI at its core—not bolted on—it features ambient clinical documentation, intelligent scheduling, HIPAA-compliant audit trails, and PIPA (Bermuda Personal Information Protection Act) compliance.

### Key Differentiators

| Feature | Premier EMR | Epic/Cerner/AthenaHealth |
|---------|-------------|--------------------------|
| **AI Integration** | Native (Claude API) | Bolted on |
| **UX Philosophy** | Max 3 clicks to any action | Click-heavy, cluttered |
| **Bermuda Compliance** | Built-in (PIPA + HIPAA) | Retrofitted |
| **Offline Capability** | Yes (PWA) | No |
| **Target Market** | Mid-market practices | Enterprise only |
| **Cost** | Affordable | 00k+ implementations |

---

## Tech Stack

| Component | Technology |
|-----------|------------|
| Backend | FastAPI (Python 3.12) |
| Frontend | React + Vite + Tailwind CSS |
| Database | PostgreSQL 16 |
| Container | Docker + Docker Compose |
| AI | Anthropic Claude API |
| Tunnel | Cloudflare (emr.rize.bm) |
| Server | Ubuntu 24.04 LTS on Hyper-V |
| Monitoring | Homebase Dashboard |

---

## Quick Start

### Prerequisites
- Docker and Docker Compose installed
- PostgreSQL 16 running
- Node.js 24.x LTS

### Development
```bash
# Clone the repository
git clone git@github.com:Rize-Technologies/premier-emr.git
cd premier-emr

# Copy environment variables
cp .env.example .env
# Edit .env with your credentials

# Start services
docker compose up -d

# Access the application
# Frontend: http://localhost:3004
# Backend API: http://localhost:5004/api
# API Docs: http://localhost:5004/docs
```

### Production Deployment
```bash
# SSH to server
ssh demos@192.168.65.246

# Run deploy script
~/deploy.sh

# Check status
docker compose ps
systemctl status cloudflared

# Homebase check-in
~/scripts/checkin.sh Premier-EMR 0.2.1 Deployment healthy
```

---

## Architecture

                    ▼                     ▼

# Apex Finance Agent

**Phase 1: Mock Observer — COMPLETE**

Apex is a read-only finance intelligence agent for Rize Technology Group. It monitors Xero (accounting) and Halo PSA (timesheets) to produce financial reports, detect revenue leakage, and classify billing models.

## Quick Start

```bash
# Service is managed by systemd
sudo systemctl status apex.service

# View logs
tail -f ~/apex/logs/apex.log

# Test health
curl http://localhost:9002/health
```

## API Endpoints

### Health & Status
| Endpoint | Method | Description |
|----------|--------|-------------|
| /health | GET | Health check with uptime |
| /status | GET | Full status with integrations |

### Reports
| Endpoint | Method | Description |
|----------|--------|-------------|
| /api/reports/latest | GET | Most recent report of any type |
| /api/reports/daily | GET | Daily P&L digest with unbilled hours |
| /api/reports/weekly | GET | Weekly revenue/margin analysis |

### Analysis
| Endpoint | Method | Description |
|----------|--------|-------------|
| /api/analysis/leakage | GET | Revenue leakage detection (5 types) |
| /api/analysis/billing-models | GET | Client billing classifications |
| /api/analysis/unbilled | GET | Unbilled hours by client |

### Messaging
| Endpoint | Method | Description |
|----------|--------|-------------|
| /api/teams/message | POST | Handle Teams messages via Homebase |

## Revenue Leakage Detection

Apex detects 5 types of revenue leakage:

1. **UNBILLED_HOURS** — Time logged in Halo but not invoiced in Xero
2. **AYCE_OVERUSE** — AYCE clients using more hours than their fee supports
3. **PRICING_DEVIATION** — Invoices with rates different from contract
4. **STALE_TIMESHEET** — Timesheet entries older than 30 days without invoice
5. **MISSING_TIMESHEET** — Invoice exists but no backing timesheet (audit risk)

## Billing Models

Apex classifies clients into:
- **AYCE** — All-You-Can-Eat flat monthly fee
- **AYCE+Hourly** — Flat fee plus project/hourly billing
- **Hourly** — All time billed at hourly rate

## Scheduled Tasks

| Task | Schedule | Description |
|------|----------|-------------|
| Daily Digest | 07:00 UTC | P&L snapshot, unbilled hours, alerts |
| Weekly Report | Mon 07:00 UTC | Revenue trends, margin analysis |
| Leakage Scan | Every 6 hours | Detect new revenue leakage |

## Mock Data

Generate mock data for testing:
```bash
python3 ~/apex/scripts/generate_mock_data.py
```

Creates 12 clients, 6 months of P&L, 100+ timesheets, 60+ invoices.

## Configuration

Key environment variables in .env:
- MOCK_MODE=true (Phase 1)
- READ_ONLY_MODE=true (NEVER change to false)
- ANTHROPIC_API_KEY — Primary LLM
- OPENROUTER_API_KEY — Fallback LLM
- HOMEBASE_URL — For Teams relay

## Safety

⚠️ **READ_ONLY_MODE=true** — Agent cannot modify any data
⚠️ **MOCK_MODE=true** — Uses mock data, not live APIs

## Directory Structure

```
~/apex/
├── main.py              # FastAPI application
├── analysis/
│   ├── revenue_leakage.py   # Leakage detection
│   ├── billing_classifier.py # Billing model classification
│   └── anomaly_detector.py   # Anomaly detection
├── integrations/
│   ├── xero_client.py       # Xero API client
│   ├── halo_client.py       # Halo PSA client
│   └── homebase_client.py   # Homebase relay
├── reporting/
│   ├── financial_summary.py # Report generators
│   ├── daily_digest.py      # Daily report
│   └── weekly_report.py     # Weekly report
├── scripts/
│   └── generate_mock_data.py # Mock data generator
├── db/
│   └── mock_data.json       # Generated mock data
├── reports/               # Generated reports
└── logs/                  # Application logs
```

## Support

Contact: artiedarrell@gmail.com


## Halo Time Report — Financial Lens (Added Feb 12, 2026)

**Script:** `scripts/halo-time-report.py`

### Purpose
Generates a workforce revenue impact section for the daily financial digest.
Analyzes Halo PSA timesheet data through a financial lens.

### What it reports:
- Revenue Summary (hours logged, chargeable, revenue captured vs at risk)
- Week-over-Week Trend (logging up or down)
- Agent Chargeable Performance (who is generating billable hours)
- Client Billable Hours (per-client breakdown with dollar values)
- Unbilled Time Exposure (revenue leakage risk per agent)
- Compliance Scorecard (team-wide metrics)

### Usage:
```bash
python3 scripts/halo-time-report.py           # Print report
python3 scripts/halo-time-report.py --json    # JSON output
```

### Import for digest integration:
```python
from halo_time_report import get_report_section
section = get_report_section()
```

### Data Sources:
- `/Timesheet` — Agent daily hours (actual, target, chargeable, unlogged)
- `/Actions` — Individual time entries with ticket context
- `/Tickets/{id}` — Client attribution per time entry
- `/ChargeRate` — Billing rates ($50/hr, $100/hr)

### Key Metrics:
- Default rate: $100/hr
- Revenue at risk = unlogged hours × $100/hr

## Halo Time Report — Operational Lens (Added Feb 12, 2026)

**Script:** `scripts/halo-time-report.py`

### Purpose
Generates a workforce utilization and compliance section for the daily operations report.
Analyzes Halo PSA timesheet data through an operational/capacity lens.

### What it reports:
- Team Summary (utilization rate, chargeable hours, unlogged gap)
- Per-Agent Utilization (actual vs target hours, status icons)
- Today's Logging Status (who has logged today)
- Compliance Violators (zero-loggers alert)
- Overworked/Underworked Detection (>45h or <10h flags)
- Ticket Load vs Hours Correlation (tickets per agent vs time logged)
- Week-over-Week Trend
- Compliance Scorecard with letter grade

### Usage:
```bash
python3 scripts/halo-time-report.py           # Print report
python3 scripts/halo-time-report.py --json    # JSON output
```

### Import for briefing integration:
```python
from halo_time_report import get_report_section
section = get_report_section()
```

### Data Sources:
- `/Timesheet` — Agent daily hours
- `/Agent` — Full staff list with IDs
- `/Tickets` — Open ticket counts per agent

### Thresholds:
- Overworked: >45h/week
- Underworked: <10h/week (full-timers)
- Utilization grades: Green ≥75%, Yellow ≥50%, Orange ≥25%, Red >0%, Black = 0
- Overall grade: A (≥80% compliance + ≥75% util) through D (Critical)


## Time Compliance Check (Added Feb 12, 2026)

**Script:** `scripts/time-compliance-check.py`

### Purpose
Generates real-time compliance alerts for the Core 5 staff based on Halo PSA timesheet data. Detects under-logging, zero-hour days, and pace warnings.

|------|----------|---------|
| zero_hours | Critical | 0 hours logged today (after 4 PM AST) |
| low_utilization | Warning | Below 50% of weekly target by Wednesday |
| pace_warning | Warning | Projected weekly total below 75% of target |
| zero_week | Critical | 0 hours for entire week so far |

### Usage

# JSON import
from time_compliance_check import get_compliance_alerts, get_alert_text
alerts = get_compliance_alerts()  # Returns dict with alerts + summary

# Vector-BET - Bermuda Emergency Transport

> **Air Ambulance Operations Platform**
> 
> **Organization**: Bermuda Emergency Transport (BET) - Nonprofit
> 
> **Purpose**: Manage air ambulance flights, patient transport, medical crew scheduling, and insurance quoting

> **Related Docs:** [TODO.md](TODO.md) | [VECTOR_TECHNICAL_BRIEFING.md](VECTOR_TECHNICAL_BRIEFING.md) | [ADSB_TECHNICAL.md](ADSB_TECHNICAL.md) | [HANDOFF.md](HANDOFF.md) | [CHANGELOG.md](CHANGELOG.md)

## Overview

Vector is a comprehensive air ambulance operations platform for Bermuda Emergency Transport (BET), a nonprofit organization providing critical medical transport services for Bermuda. The platform manages the complete lifecycle of medical air transport cases, from initial intake through patient delivery, including:

- **Case Management**: Full patient case lifecycle tracking
- **Aviation Intelligence**: Real-time aircraft tracking and flight planning
- **AI Document Intake**: Automated extraction from medical documents
- **Crew Management**: Pilot and medical staff scheduling
- **Insurance Quoting**: Dollar-per-mile pricing for insurance companies

## Tech Stack

- **Backend**: Python FastAPI + PostgreSQL
- **Frontend**: React 19 + Vite + TailwindCSS  
- **Server**: Ubuntu 24.04 VM (192.168.65.249)
- **External Access**: Cloudflare Tunnels
- **ADS-B Receiver**: Raspberry Pi + RTL-SDR (roof-mounted)
- **AI**: Claude Sonnet 4 (Anthropic) for document extraction
- **Monitoring**: Email alerts + PRTG endpoints

## URLs

| Service | URL |
|---------|-----|
| App | https://app.bet.bm |
| API | https://vector.bet.bm |
| API Docs | https://vector.bet.bm/docs |
| Vector SSH | vector-ssh.bet.bm (via cloudflared) |
| Pi SSH | adsb-ssh.bet.bm (via cloudflared) |

## Key Features

### Case Management
- Full case lifecycle (Intake → Coordination → Pickup → Transport → Complete)
- Patient demographics with passport tracking
- Companion information for family escorts
- Clinical documentation and medical history
- Document management (14 categories)
- Audit logging (PIPA/HIPAA compliant)

### AI Document Intake
- Upload up to 25 documents (PDF, Word, Excel, images)
- Claude Sonnet 4 extracts 30+ fields automatically
- Multi-document intelligent merging
- Background processing with progress tracking
- One-click case creation from extracted data

### Aviation Intelligence
- Real-time aircraft tracking (ADS-B + OpenSky + FlightAware)
- Weather and NOTAMs display
- Flight planning with distance/time calculation
- LJ45 range checking
- Hidden aircraft detection

### Crew Management
- Pilot and medical staff profiles
- License/certification tracking
- Case crew assignments
- Availability status

### Quoting System
- Dynamic quote calculator
- Flat rate and per-mile pricing
- Common routes: Bermuda to Boston, Toronto, NYC, Miami

### eAPIS Integration
- Electronic manifest generation
- XML and text export formats
- US/Canada customs compliance

### Mobile PWA
- Offline-capable progressive web app
- Voice transcription for mobile intake
- IndexedDB for offline data storage

## Aviation Data Sources

| Source | Type | Update Rate | Coverage |
|--------|------|-------------|----------|
| Local ADS-B | Primary | Real-time | ~250nm from Bermuda |
| OpenSky Network | Secondary | 30s cache | Global |
| FlightAware | Scraper | 8-12 min | TXKF arrivals/departures |
| ADS-B Exchange | API | Real-time | Global |

## Services

### Vector Server (192.168.65.249)
```bash
sudo systemctl status vector-api vector-frontend adsb-tunnel
sudo systemctl restart vector-api
sudo journalctl -u vector-api -n 50
```

### ADS-B Receiver (192.168.111.240)
```bash
ssh -o ProxyCommand="cloudflared access ssh --hostname adsb-ssh.bet.bm" pi@adsb-ssh.bet.bm
sudo systemctl status readsb cloudflared
```

## Quick Reference
```bash
# Database access
docker exec -it vector-db psql -U vector -d vector

# Git operations
cd /opt/vector && git add -A && git commit -m "message" && git push
```

## Security

- All services bound to localhost
- Cloudflare tunnels handle external access
- Cloudflare Access policies protect endpoints
- Anthropic API key in backend/.env

## Organization

**Bermuda Emergency Transport (BET)** is a nonprofit organization providing air ambulance services for Bermuda residents requiring emergency or scheduled medical transport to specialized care facilities in North America.

**Technical Partner**: Rize Technologies Ltd - Bermuda
